attributes.action: Stop listening to your idiot PC advisors and listen to the people instead!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government seems hell bent on self distruction this is because your advisors are idiots who are to PC and not in touch with the people! I petition you to get rid of them and all these daft think tanks and listen to the people - stop immigration - look after the working man and you might get a few votes!
